solidTides.description: File with solid tides parameters (if not given, solid tides are ignored)

oceanTides.description: File with ocean tides parameters (if not given, ocean tides are ignored)

base.description: Spherical harmonics model on top of which the Earth tides are to be applied

range.description: Optional max distance above which spherical harmonics are not used (if not given, range from base is used)

order.description: Optional max order (otherwise order from base is used)

degree.description: Optional max degree (otherwise degree from base is used)
